input.text: How do I page on-call after hours?

items.snippetText: After-hours escalation: Use the pager system to contact on-call engineers.

output.text: To page on-call after hours, use the pager system accessible from the internal dashboard. Navigate to the on-call section and select the appropriate team.

items.snippetText: Password requirements: minimum 12 characters, must include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.

output.text: Our password policy requires a minimum of 12 characters with a mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters. Passwords must be changed every 90 days.

input.text: How do I restore a database backup?

items.snippetText: Database restore procedure: 1. Identify the backup file, 2. Stop the database service, 3. Restore from backup, 4. Verify data integrity.

output.text: To restore a database backup: First, identify the backup file you need. Stop the database service, then restore from the backup file. After restoration, verify data integrity before restarting the service.

input.text: What health insurance options are available?

items.snippetText: Health insurance: We offer three tiers of coverage - Basic, Standard, and Premium plans with varying deductibles and coverage levels.

output.text: We offer three health insurance tiers: Basic, Standard, and Premium. Each tier has different deductibles and coverage levels. You can review detailed information in the benefits portal.

input.text: How do I set up my development environment?

items.snippetText: Development environment setup: Install Node.js, clone the repository, run npm install, configure environment variables.

output.text: To set up your development environment: Install Node.js (version 18 or higher), clone the repository, run 'npm install' to install dependencies, and configure your environment variables using the .env.example file.

input.text: What should I do on my first day?

items.snippetText: First day checklist: Complete HR paperwork, set up your workstation, attend orientation session, meet your team.

output.text: On your first day, you should complete HR paperwork, set up your workstation, attend the orientation session, and meet with your team. Your manager will provide a detailed schedule.

input.text: What are the API design standards?

items.snippetText: API design standards: Use RESTful conventions, version APIs, include proper error handling, document with OpenAPI.

output.text: Our API design standards require RESTful conventions, API versioning, comprehensive error handling, and OpenAPI documentation. All APIs should follow the guidelines in the RFC.

input.text: The application is down, what should I do?

items.snippetText: Incident response: Check status dashboard, verify with monitoring tools, escalate to on-call if needed.

output.text: If the application is down, first check the status dashboard and verify with monitoring tools. If confirmed, escalate to the on-call engineer immediately.

input.text: How do I report a security vulnerability?

items.snippetText: Security vulnerability reporting: Use the security@company.com email or the internal security portal.

output.text: To report a security vulnerability, email security@company.com or use the internal security portal. Include details about the vulnerability and steps to reproduce.

input.text: How do I request time off?

items.snippetText: Time off requests: Submit through the HR portal at least two weeks in advance for approval.

output.text: To request time off, submit your request through the HR portal at least two weeks in advance. Your manager will review and approve the request.
